video.title: Los Heroes del Norte
video.synopsis: Five young people fatefully come together to overcome economic, social and moral crises by forming a band.

episodes.synopsis: Brought together by destiny and a shared love of music, five men with nothing to lose form a band.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Los Héroes del Norte and Ignacia run from Procopio and Perla Alhelí. Don Eustaquio begins to feel like he's at death's door.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Los Héroes del Norte sign up for a battle of the bands organized by the town's most popular radio station.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Faquir wakes up not recognizing anyone and tries to run away. Los Héroes del Norte book another gig at a circus.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: With a new debt to Trácalas to pay off and not a penny to their name, Los Héroes del Norte have to return to Hassan's circus.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Zacarías returns, happy with his new song "We Tried," and decides to come back as leader of the band.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: After a successful performance with Mariana Seoane, Los Héroes del Norte begin their trek to the great city.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The band records their new single, meets with an image consultant and gives an interview after their video premieres.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Márgara sees Los Héroes del Norte on television and goes on a hysterical search for her Chaparrito. Meanwhile, the band's single hits the top 10.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The big day arrives: Chaparrito and Márgara get married in Caborca, whose mayor gives Chaparrito the key to the city.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: After the band plays for a massive audience, their bus is stopped by a truck, and two armed men order them to get out.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Los Héroes board the truck with the two armed men. When they arrive at a ranch, they're greeted by a surprise that's quickly interrupted by gunshots.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: No one knows where Los Héroes del Norte are, and their disappearance becomes national news.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Apolinar's wife, Márgara, is found, but the comandante believes that she's lying about the kidnapping.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Zacarías's paternity scandal is now a daily topic of conversation on all the gossip shows. Meanwhile, the band wins a slew of awards.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Don Pascasio tries to blackmail the band for a huge sum of money. Meanwhile, Prisca decides to leave Hassan forever.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: As the photo scandal continues to plague Los Héroes, Doña Olegaria suspends all the band's activities.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Los Héroes's tax problem is more serious than they thought, and they propose putting on one last concert to raise the money they owe.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Zacarías goes to the funeral for the rest of Los Héroes as the whole country mourns. Los Héroes, thinking they're ghosts, visit their own tombs.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: International stars record a disc paying homage Los Héroes. Meanwhile, Zacarías's success as a solo artist goes to his head.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The band members decide to take separate paths in search of their individual dreams. Apolinar breaks up with Márgara.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Zacarías ends his relationship with Doña Olegaria and begins to work with the Trácalas. Natasha tries to convince Apolinar to make a documentary.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Zacarías returns to the band, and Los Héroes introduce themselves to the media. Meanwhile, Hassan kidnaps Prisca.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Things take a turn for the worse when album sales plummet. Zacarías goes to therapy and tries to lose some weight.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: When the band signs a contract to do a reality TV show, Zacarías finds out and threatens to sue. Prisca reports Hassan, and the police arrest him.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Zacarías finally begins rehab, and after spending time with a sensei, he feels ready to return to the band.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Zacarías makes it to the finals on a reality show on Televisa. After a vote by phone, he becomes the fourth finalist.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The finalists sing and the crowd goes wild. When the time comes to announce the winner, Zacarías gives a moving speech.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Los Héroes are stranded on the side of the road when their bus breaks down, and they spend the night with a family that's been dead for 40 years.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Doña Olegaria gets a court summons, putting Los Héroes at risk. They have to change their look and escape from the city as soon as possible.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Doña Olegaria can't continue to compete with Roger. The band has a concert date in Los Angeles, but none of them are able to enter the United States.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Los Héroes uncover some surprising things about their past as they try to figure out how to enter the United States to play in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Los Héroes arrive in Los Angeles, thinking their show is at Dodger Stadium. But they're in for a surprise when they learn what the actual venue is.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: As Los Héroes head back home to Mexico, their truck is stolen and they get stuck in the desert with kidnappers.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: The band has a serious problem: Everyone has switched bodies and personalities. Meanwhile, Prisca is showing symptoms of pregnancy.
episodes.title: Episode 17
